pullrequest.title: Scan and dock worlds - models are aleady present

content.raw:
For trial #2 \(last one\) of both dock and scan\_and\_dock, removing the second dock so that there is only one dock.  Having two scan and dock scoring plugins running at the same time is causing issues, so best just to keep it simple for now.

I believe this addresses the issue of the placard going blank when the system transitions to onRunning.
content.html:
For trial #2 (last one) of both dock and scan_and_dock, removing the second dock so that there is only one dock. Having two scan and dock scoring plugins running at the same time is causing issues, so best just to keep it simple for now.

I believe this addresses the issue of the placard going blank when the system transitions to onRunning.
